org.lafayette.server.filter
Class SecurityContextFilterDigest

java.lang.Object
  org.lafayette.server.filter.SecurityContextFilterDigest
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerRequestFilter, com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerResponseFilter, com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ResourceFilter, SecuirityContextFilter
@Provider
 class SecurityContextFilterDigest
extends Object
implements SecuirityContextFilter

Filters resource request/response for digest authentication. If a user is authorized then a User representing the user is injected as Principal to the SecurityContext.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

verifyAuthentiaction

private boolean verifyAuthentiaction(RequestParameters params)
Verifies the digest authentication request parameters against user from persistent store.

Parameters:
params - must not be null
Returns:
true if authentication parameters are valid, else false

createAndSetPrincipal

private void createAndSetPrincipal(com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerRequest request,
                                   RequestParameters params)
If a authentication request was valid, loads user data from persistent store and set the user as principal on requests security context.

Parameters:
request - must not be null
params - must not be null

findPrincipal

private User findPrincipal(RequestParameters params)
Helper method to find a user by the request parameters.

Parameters:
params - must not be null
Returns:
may return null if no user found.
